mapper.select: select m.perms from sys_user as u join sys_user_role as ur on u.user_id=ur.user_id join sys_role as r on ur.role_id=r.role_id join sys_role_menu as rm on r.role_id=rm.role_id join sys_menu as m on rm.menu_id=m.menu_id where u.username=#{userName}

select DISTINCT m.menu_id,m.parent_id,m.name,m.url,m.perms,m.type,m.icon,m.order_num from sys_user as u join sys_user_role as ur on u.user_id=ur.user_id join sys_role as r on ur.role_id=r.role_id join sys_role_menu as rm on r.role_id=rm.role_id join sys_menu as m on rm.menu_id=m.menu_id where u.username=#{userName} and m.parent_id=#{parentId}
